name: jsts
description: A JavaScript library of spatial predicates and functions for processing geometry
author: Bj√∂rn Harrtell <bjorn@wololo.org>

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_PATH=src nyc mocha --timeout 10s -r esm --recursive test/auto/node test/manual
scripts.test-perf: cross-env NODE_PATH=src 0x -- node -r esm $(which _mocha) --timeout 10s --recursive test/auto/node test/manual
scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.js -o dist/jsts.js && terser dist/jsts.js --source-map content=dist/jsts.js.map,filename=dist/jsts.min.js.map,url=jsts.min.js.map --comments -c -m -o dist/jsts.min.js
scripts.build-es6: rollup -c rollup.config.es6.js -o dist/jsts.es6.js && terser dist/jsts.es6.js --module --source-map content=dist/jsts.es6.js.map,filename=dist/jsts.es6.min.js.map,url=jsts.es6.min.js.map --comments -c -m -o dist/jsts.es6.min.js
